name: Michael T. Actions
description:
The Canha Adventure Game. BUY NOW (FREE)

Little quirked-up raccoon goes on a daring adventure across at least 2 ish levels collecting funi hats and coins sometimes I guess.

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump when allowed

SHIFT - Sprint when allowed

E - Stuff

 WARNING: This game gets meta from time to time cos we think we are smart. By playing this game you are contractually obligated to enjoy it and laugh at my bad jokes.

This Game was made during the Github-GameOff game jam...

SO BEFORE YOU GO CRITICISING IT JUST KNOW THAT IT WAS ONLY MADE IN A MONTH AND WE DIDN'T HAVE MUCH FREE TIME AS I THOUGHT OKAY MOM!? Nah I'm only joshing your jimmies, have fun with it, if it's shit let us know, here's one of the Dev's home addresses: [REDACTED]

Michael T. Actions = Micro-transactions (get it)
